member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.IEntityFrameworkService.AddRequiredEntity(Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.CodeGenerationContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the for the provided context type and entity type. If an Entity Framework context type does not exist matching the given type name, it will be created. If the context does not contain a entity set property matching the provided entity type, then a property will be added.
member.param: The full type name of the Entity Framework context type.
The full type name of the Entity Framework entity type.
member.returns: The for the provided entity type and context type

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.Resources.CannotFindTemplates
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not find template '{0}' in these folders ['{1}'], including sub-folders..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.Resources.CouldNotGenerateDbContext
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The DB context type '{0}' could not be generated or located. Possible causes include: invalid characters in the class name or the file exists on disk but is not included in the project. .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.Resources.EFDbContextCodeGeneratorNoModelProperty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' is not a System.Data.Entity.DbContext class and does not contain a '{1}' property, so it cannot be used as the database context..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.Resources.EntityFrameworkDbContextScaffolder_EmptyDbContextTypeName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DbContext type name cannot be null or empty..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.Resources.StringArgument_Empty_ErrorMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Parameter '{0}' cannot be null or empty..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.Resources.UnableToCheckoutFile
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not checkout the file '{0}' from source control..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.Resources.UnableToFindCodeType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The type '{0}' was not found in the current solution..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.Resources.UnableToFindReflectionType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There was an error getting the type '{0}'. Try rebuilding the project..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.Resources.UnableToRetrieveMetadata
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to retrieve metadata for '{0}'. {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.Resources.UnsupportedCodeLanguage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The code language of the current project is not supported. The only supported languages are CSharp and VisualBasic..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Scaffolding.EntityFramework.Resources.UnsupportedEntityFrameworkVersion
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Entity Framework 5 or later is required for the current operation but not available. Make sure the project has a reference to Entity Framework version 5 or greater..
